species.name: venomoth
descriptions: It flutters its wings to scatter dustlike scales. The scales leach toxins if they contact skin.
The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.
The powder on its wings is poisonous if it is dark in color. If it is light, it causes paralysis.
The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.
The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.

abilities.name: shield-dust
abilities.effect: Protects against incoming moves' extra effects.

abilities.name: tinted-lens
abilities.effect: Doubles damage inflicted with not-very-effective moves.

abilities.name: wonder-skin
abilities.effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.
